lead_paragraph: A Russian lawmaker has proposed an unorthodox solution to the country's problems with soccer hooliganism ahead of next year's World Cup — legalize it and make it a spectator sport.
snippet: A Russian lawmaker has proposed an unorthodox solution to the country's problems with soccer hooliganism ahead of next year's World Cup — legalize it and make it a spectator sport....

headline.main: Transgender Boy With Girls Wrestling Title: 'I Don't Cheat'
headline.print_headline: Transgender Boy With Girls Wrestling Title: 'I Don't Cheat'
